info.name: StateSet API
info.description: Postman collection covering the StateSet API surface.

request.description: Retrieve service version and deployment metadata.
Check database and cache connectivity status.
Get a paginated list of orders with optional filters.
Retrieve an order by its identifier.
Retrieve an order using the public order number.
List line items associated with an order.
Create a new order with one or more items.
Update addresses or metadata for an order.
Delete (hard delete) an order by id.
Advance the order status and optionally store a reason.
Append an item to an existing order.
Cancel an order and record the cancellation reason.
Archive an order without deleting it.
Retrieve inventory snapshots with optional filters.
Create inventory for a given item and location.
Get inventory details by id or item number.
Update inventory location or descriptive fields.
Delete an inventory record.
Reserve inventory against a reference id.
Release a prior inventory reservation.
Identify items below a threshold.
List product returns with pagination.
Retrieve a return by id.
Create a new return for an order.
Approve a pending return.
Trigger restocking for an approved return.
List shipments with optional status filter.
Fetch shipment details by id.
Create a shipment for an order.

body.raw:
{
  "order_id": "11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111",
  "shipping_address": "123 Shipping Lane, San Francisco, CA 94105",
  "shipping_method": "standard",
  "tracking_number": "1Z9999999999999999",
  "recipient_name": "Ada Lovelace"
}

request.description: Mark a shipment as shipped.
Mark a shipment as delivered.
Request the latest tracking status by shipment id.
Request tracking details using a carrier tracking number.
List warranty registrations with optional status filter.
Retrieve a warranty record by id.
Register a new warranty for a product/customer.
Submit a warranty claim for review.
Approve an existing warranty claim.
Extend an active warranty by additional months.
Fetch recommended products for an agent context.
Agent adds an item into a customer's cart.
List work orders with filter options.
Create a new work order for production or maintenance.
Retrieve a work order by id.
Update status, priority, or schedule for a work order.
Delete a work order.
Schedule a work order at a specific work center.
Mark a work order as in progress.
Complete a work order and capture timestamps.
Place a work order on hold with a reason.
Cancel a work order with context.
Assign a work order to a technician.
Update the work order status explicitly.
Record material consumption for a work order.
Update status or hours for a specific task.
Inspect capacity information for a work center.
List bill of materials records with pagination query params.
Create a bill of materials with components.
Retrieve a BOM by id.
Update metadata for a BOM.
Audit a BOM revision.
List components within a BOM.
Add a component to the BOM.
Remove a component from the BOM.
Process a payment for an order.
List payments with pagination and optional status filter.
Retrieve a payment by id.
List payments associated with an order.
Compute the total amount collected for an order.
Process a refund against an existing payment.
Receive asynchronous payment notifications.
Create a purchase order with one or more line items.
Retrieve a purchase order by id.
Update expected delivery, notes, or status for a purchase order.
Approve a drafted purchase order.
Cancel a purchase order.
Record receipt of purchase order items.
List purchase orders for a supplier.
List purchase orders filtered by status.
List purchase orders within a delivery date range.
Sum purchase order value for a date range.
Create an advanced shipping notice.
List ASNs with pagination.
Retrieve an ASN by id.
Mark an ASN as in transit.
Mark an ASN as delivered.
List products with pagination and optional search.
Create a new product in the catalog.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Widget Pro",
  "sku": "WID-PRO-01",
  "description": "Next generation widget",
  "price": "129.99",
  "currency": "USD",
  "is_active": true,
  "is_digital": false,
  "brand": "StateSet",
  "manufacturer": "StateSet Manufacturing",
  "weight_kg": "1.25",
  "dimensions_cm": "25x15x10",
  "tags": "featured,new",
  "tax_rate": "0.08"
}

request.description: Retrieve product details by id.
Update product metadata.
List variants for a product.
Create a variant for a product.
Update the price for a product variant.
Search products using keyword and pagination.
Create a new shopping cart.
Retrieve cart with items.
Add an item to the cart.
Update quantity for a cart line item.
Remove an item from the cart.
Remove all items from the cart.
Create a checkout session from a cart.
Retrieve checkout session details.
Set customer information for checkout.
Set the shipping address for checkout.
Select a shipping method for the checkout session.
Complete checkout with a payment token.
Register a new commerce customer.
Authenticate a customer with email and password.
Retrieve profile for the authenticated customer.
Update profile details for the authenticated customer.
List saved addresses for the authenticated customer.
Add a new address to the customer profile.
Create agentic checkout session with buyer and items.
Retrieve an agentic checkout session by id.
Update an agentic checkout session with new items or address.
Complete the agentic checkout session with payment data.
Cancel an agentic checkout session.
List pending or failed outbox events for retry.
Retry processing a specific outbox event.
